comment:
HOPS:GALLON ration is under 1.
Add 1 oz of an aroma hop (citra is the Lute Olson of hops) post boil for 30 min. Use that fancy wort chiller and code you came up with to find the proper water temp to circulate to get a cool down period of 30 min.
sure i'll give it a shot next time. last time i did this 5 gal version it was just a kind-of-hoppy light amber and was pretty good.
